00001 ! ======================
00002 !
00003 !   VIS_PARTS
00004 !
00005 !   Send particle data to VISIT for real-time visualisation
00006 !
00007 !
00008 ! ======================
00009 
00010 subroutine vis_parts
00011 
00012 
00013   use physvars
00014   use treevars
00015   implicit none   
00016   include 'mpif.h'
00017 
00018   integer, parameter :: npart_visit_max = 100000  ! Max 250k data points for VIS
00019   integer, parameter :: ship_max = 10000
00020   real, dimension(npart_visit_max) :: xvis,yvis,zvis,vx,vy,vz,qvis,mvis
00021   integer, dimension(npart_visit_max) :: ppid, plabel
00022   real, dimension(nppm) :: xv, yv, zv, uxv,uyv,uzv,qv,mv
00023   integer, dimension(nppm) :: pepidv, pelabelv
00024 
00025   integer, dimension(num_pe) :: nparts_pe, recv_strides  ! array of npp on each PE
00026   integer :: icolour(npart_visit_max)
00027   integer :: lvisit_active, nskip, nproot, ne_buf, ni_buf, npart_buf, nbufe, nbufi
00028   integer :: i, j, k, ioffset,ixd, iyd, izd, ilev, lcount, wfdatai
00029 
00030   real :: s, simtime, dummy, xd,yd,zd, dx, dz, dy, epond_max, box_max, epondx, epondy, epondz,phipond
00031   real :: plasma1, plasma2, plasma3, t_display, wfdatar, u2, amp_las
00032   integer :: nship, ierr
00033 
00034   convert_mu=1.
00035   simtime = dt*(itime+itime_start)
00036 
00037   nskip = npart/ship_max + 1
00038   if (beam_config==4) then
00039      amp_las = vosc*min(1.,simtime/tpulse)
00040   else 
00041      amp_las = vosc
00042   endif
00043 
00044   if (beam_config>=3 .and. beam_config<=5) then
00045      t_display = tlaser*convert_fs
00046   else
00047      t_display = simtime
00048   endif
00049 
00050   if (beam_config<=3) then
00051      plasma1 = Ukine*convert_keV
00052      plasma2 = Ukini*convert_keV
00053   else
00054      plasma1=sigma
00055      plasma2=tpulse
00056   endif
00057 
00058   if (nskip>1 .and. uthresh==-1) uthresh=vte**2
00059 
00060   ! Filter out particles for shipping
00061   nbufe = 0
00062   nbufi = 0
00063   nship=0
00064 
00065 ! TODO:  separate interesting ions and electrons
00066   do i=1,npp
00067      u2=0.5*0.511*mass_ratio*(ux(i)**2+uy(i)**2+uz(i)**2) ! in MeV
00068 !    if ((npart>100000 .and. (u2>uthresh .and. q(i)>0)) .or. (npart<100000 .and. mod(pelabel(i),nskip).eq.0)) then
00069     if ((npart>=100000 .and. (u2>uthresh .and. q(i)<0)) .or. (npart<100000 .and. mod(pelabel(i),nskip).eq.0)) then
00070         nship=nship+1
00071         nbufe=nbufe+1
00072 !        nbufi=nbufi+1
00073 
00074         !        else if (q(i)>0 .and. mod(pelabel(i),nskip).eq.0) then
00075         !           nbufi=nbufi+1
00076         !          nship=nship+1
00077      ! scaled coordinates
00078      xv(nship) = convert_mu*x(i)
00079      yv(nship) = convert_mu*y(i)
00080      zv(nship) = convert_mu*z(i)
00081      uxv(nship) = ux(i)
00082      uyv(nship) = uy(i)
00083      uzv(nship) = uz(i)
00084      qv(nship) = q(i)
00085      !        mv(nship) = m(i)
00086      pepidv(nship) = pepid(i)
00087      pelabelv(nship) = pelabel(i)
00088    endif
00089   end do
00090 
00091   call MPI_ALLGATHER( nship, 1, MPI_INTEGER, nparts_pe,1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00092   recv_strides(1:num_pe) = (/ 0,( SUM( nparts_pe(1:i-1) ),i=2,num_pe ) /)
00093   npart_buf = (SUM(nparts_pe))  ! total # particles to send
00094   call MPI_ALLREDUCE( nbufe, ne_buf, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00095   call MPI_ALLREDUCE( nbufi, ni_buf, 1, MPI_INTEGER, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00096 
00097   if (me==0) then 
00098         write(*,*) '# particles shipped ',npart_buf
00099         write(*,*) 'u_thresh: (MeV)     ',uthresh
00100   endif
00101   if (npart_buf>0 .and. npart_buf < 2*ship_max) then
00102      ! send  particle data from all PEs
00103      ! increase momentum threshold if close to max ship # 
00104      if (1.0*npart_buf/ship_max > 0.9) uthresh=uthresh*1.1
00105      if (me==0) then
00106 !        call flvisit_spk_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00107 ! spk version2
00108         !       call flvisit_spk_info_send(npart_buf,xl,yl,zl,zl,ne,ni,np_beam,itime+itime_start)
00109         wfdatai=int(t_display)
00110         wfdatar=t_display
00111 !        call flvisit_spk_info_send(npart_buf,xl,yl,zl, xl, &
00112 !             t_display, amp_las, plasma1, plasma2, &
00113 !             ne,ni,npart,wfdatai)
00114 
00115      endif
00116      !
00117      ! visit info block format in spk4
00118      ! int flvisit_spk_info_send(int *npart,double *xl,double *yl,double *zl,double *sbox,double *boxoffsetx,double *vosc,double *sigma,double *tphase,int *ne,int *ni,int *np,int *itime);
00119 
00120 
00121      ! work out stride lengths so that partial arrays placed sequentially in global array
00122 
00123 
00124      ! Gather particle data onto root PE
00125      call MPI_GATHERV( pepidv, nship, MPI_INTEGER, ppid, nparts_pe, recv_strides, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00126      !     call MPI_GATHERV( pelabelv, nship, MPI_INTEGER, plabel, nparts_pe, recv_strides, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr) 
00127      plabel(1:npart_buf) = (/ (i,i=1,npart_buf) /) ! Relabel 
00128      call MPI_GATHERV( xv, nship, MPI_REAL, xvis, nparts_pe, recv_strides, MPI_REAL, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00129      call MPI_GATHERV( yv, nship, MPI_REAL, yvis, nparts_pe, recv_strides, MPI_REAL, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00130      call MPI_GATHERV( zv, nship, MPI_REAL, zvis, nparts_pe, recv_strides, MPI_REAL, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00131 
00132      call MPI_GATHERV( uxv, nship, MPI_REAL, vx, nparts_pe, recv_strides, MPI_REAL, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00133      call MPI_GATHERV( uyv, nship, MPI_REAL, vy, nparts_pe, recv_strides, MPI_REAL, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00134      call MPI_GATHERV( uzv, nship, MPI_REAL, vz, nparts_pe, recv_strides, MPI_REAL, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00135      call MPI_GATHERV( qv, nship, MPI_REAL, qvis, nparts_pe, recv_strides, MPI_REAL, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr )
00136 
00137  
00138      if (me.eq.0) then
00139 
00140 !        call flvisit_spk_particles_send(t_display,xvis,yvis,zvis,vx,vy,vz,qvis,ppid,plabel,npart_buf)
00141      endif
00142 
00143   else
00144      ! Just send particles on root
00145      if (me==0) then
00146         if (npart_buf>2*ship_max) then
00147            write(*,*) 'Too many particles to ship - sending ones on root'
00148            uthresh = uthresh*2
00149            write(*,*) 'Increasing momentum threshold to: ',sqrt(abs(uthresh))
00150         else if (npart_buf==0 .and. ne > 0) then
00151            uthresh = vte*2
00152            write(*,*) 'Reducing momentum threshold to: ',sqrt(abs(uthresh))
00153         endif
00154            nproot = 0.8*npart/num_pe ! fixed # parts close to npp
00155 
00156 !           call flvisit_spk_check_connection(lvisit_active)
00157            !        call flvisit_spk_info_send(npp,xl,yl,zl,zl,nep,nip,np_beam,itime+itime_start)
00158            wfdatai=int(tlaser)
00159            wfdatar=tlaser
00160 !           call flvisit_spk_info_send(nproot,xl,yl,zl, t_display, &
00161 !                x_crit, amp_las, sigma, tpulse, &
00162 !                ne,ni,npart,wfdatai)
00163 !           call flvisit_spk_particles_send(t_display,x,y,z,ux,uy,uz,q,pepid,pelabel,npp)
00164         endif
00165      endif
00166 
00167 
00168      if (me==0) then
00169 
00170         ! ship branch nodes to show domains
00171         do j=1,nbranch_sum
00172            ilev = log( 1.*branch_key(j) )/log(8.)
00173            ixd = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(j),3*i,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00174            iyd = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(j),3*i+1,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00175            izd = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(j),3*i+2,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00176            mvis(j) = boxsize/2**(ilev)          !  box length
00177            xvis(j)=(xmin + (ixd+0.05)*mvis(j))*convert_mu ! corners?
00178            yvis(j)=(ymin + (iyd+0.05)*mvis(j))*convert_mu
00179            zvis(j)=(zmin + (izd+0.05)*mvis(j))*convert_mu 
00180            mvis(j) = mvis(j)*0.9
00181         end do
00182 !        call flvisit_spk_domains_send( tlaser, xvis,yvis,zvis,mvis,branch_owner,xvis,nbranch_sum)
00183 
00184      endif
00185 
00186 ! Make sure everyone else knows about new momentum threshold
00187      call MPI_BCAST( uthresh, 1, MPI_REAL, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00188 
00189      call MPI_BARRIER( MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)  ! Wait for everyone to catch up
00190 
00191 
00192    end subroutine vis_parts
